body.p:
Lexington Ky Jan 1 1864
Adgent General Ky
Sir

I Do hearby Respectfly my Return my Comission The reason of Its not being Done before was that my Regiment being at Front and Its being very unsafe to send anny Papers of Value that I deemed it to wait untill I Returned to the State of Ky and this is my First Opportunity of Doing So

Your Obedient Servant
James Powell 3rd Sarg Co I
11th Ky Cavlry

11 Cavy
Lexington Ky
Jany 1" 1864
Powell James
3d Sgt. Co. I. 11" Ky Cav.
Returns his commission as 1" Lt 11" Ky Cavy.-
Cancel Commission
D W Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Genl
for nonacceptance
Recd A. G. O. Ky 3d Jany 1865
